籤詩版本二:
Unyoro hwakakunda simba kubva kare, uye musuwo wemabasa akanaka unobudirira.
Kana mumwe munhu akashopera iyi hexagram, zvinoita sekusangana neYaojing kana uine nyota.
詩意:
Iyi hexagram chiratidzo chemutsa uye unyoro.
Muzvinhu zvose, kuwirirana ndicho chinowanzoitwa.
解曰: Denga nenyika zvine manzwiro. Chokwadi. Mwari naBhudha vanokuchengetedza. Usakanganwa zvaunazvo.
籤詩故事一:
◇Renzong akaziva mai vake
Murongo waSong Zhenzong, Murongo Liu, akaita godo nekuzvarwa kwaMurongo Li wemwanakomana, Zhao Zhen, ndokupa chiokomuhomwe kuti atsive mwanakomana waMurongo Li nekatsi yeganda. Imba yamambo inotonhora.Murongo Liu akakwanisa kugadzwa.
Mushure mekunge Murongo De akwidziridzwa kuita umambo, Murongo De akapisa muzinda unotonhora akaronga kuuraya Murongo Li.Murongo Li akapukunyuka ndokugara pakati pavanhu.
Murongo Li pakutanga akakanda Zhao Zhen murwizi, asi rombo rakanaka akanunurwa nengomwa ndokutumirwa kuPalace yeVachenjeri Vasere. Paakakura, akatsiva Song Renzong.
Gare gare, Bao Zheng (Bao Qingtian) akasangana netsaona muMurongo Li. Paakadzidza chokwadi, akaongorora nyaya yacho nesimba, uye pakupedzisira chokwadi chakabuda pachena, uye Song Renzong naamai vaLi nemwanakomana wavo vakazivana. Murongo Liu akakandwa mumuzinda waitonhora uye Murongo Li akagamuchirwa mumuzinda.
聖意: Musha nemba zvakanakisa ndinoshuvira hupfumi ndinoshuvira rombo rakanaka mune bhizinesi wanano nemuchato varume nevanofamba netsoka Vimbai minda makonye ematsutso Profit mhuka nhanhatu
